name: trf2bsml
description: convert Tandem Repeat Finder (trf) output to BSML

options.description: Input .dat file from a RepeatMasker search.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
Output BSML file (will be created, must not exist)
Project ID. Used in creating feature ids. Defaults to 'unknown' if not passed and is unable to parse from input file name.
Used in the generation of ids.
[OPTIONAL] A non-zero value will result in compressed bsml output. If there is no .gz extension on the output file name, one will be added.
[OPTIONAL] The file used as input for the trf run.
